alert.note: Alert for Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 5:32PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Brief Landspout Tornadoes Possible... At 430 PM MDT/530 PM CDT/, conditions are becoming favorable for the development of landspout tornadoes across the greater northwestern Kansas area, if storms are able to form. However, at this time it is unknown which if any storm would produce a landspout. Any tornadoes which develop are expected to pose a limited threat. Locations impacted include... Colby, Goodland, Norton, Oakley, Oberlin, Hill City and Hoxie. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland. Landspout tornadoes can form with a developing thunderstorm before rain, hail, and even thunder is observed. Landspout tornadoes are not usually associated with a wall cloud and are often difficult to detect with weather radar. &&
